'''Fresh Wind of Freedom''' is an [[Arcane Legend Card|Arcane Legend]] [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Story==
{{Description|"The [[Barbatos|heavenly bard]] brushed the strings of the lyre, summoning forth the gale, dispersing the ice and snow, cleaving the peaks, and making the new [[Mondstadt]] the home of freedom."|title=Fresh Wind of Freedom}}
